title: Expected Atendees at tonight's Italy State Dinner | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
October 18, 2016

 



Expected Atendees at tonight's Italy State Dinner





	Below is a list of expected attendees at tonight’s Italy State Dinner. Additional details about the State Dinner are available HERE.

	 

THE PRESIDENT AND MRS. OBAMA
